main event: A round silver colored object was sighted very high and not moving fast north west of Red Bluff, California.
interesting points: The sighting was reported on July 21, 1952, at 15 miles northwest of Red Bluff., The object was described as being round and silver colored., Weather balloons were released shortly before midnight on the same day., The report indicates clear weather conditions at the time of the sighting., The sighting was overseen by Mr. Schlosser.
